Ron Becker on Test 30 Jul 2023

What is Mastodon, And Why Should I Use It?

What is Mastodon?

Mastodon is a decentralized, federated social network, and an alternative to sites like Twitter. A federated site is one that is split across many, smaller sites that are all linked together. When you sign up on one site you can make friends with people, and see what they share and post on other sites. Being decentralized means that it is not all held in one place, or ran by one person or corporation.

»
Ron Becker on OpenSource, SocialMedia, and Fediverse 25 Jul 2023
